sentences.sContent: As tempers rose, he spoke out strongly against some of the radical ideas for selling off state-owned property.
sentences.sCn: 随着火气上升，他公开表达了对某些卖掉国有资产的过激想法的强烈反对。

trans.tranOther: If you speak out against something or in favour of something, you say publicly that you think it is bad or good.
